title: Spiced Kiwi Lamb Brochettes
ingredients: ['600g lean boned leg of lamb, cut into bite-sized chunks', '1 ripe kiwi fruit', '1 garlic clove, crushed', '1 tbsp grated fresh root ginger', '1 tsp coriander seeds, crushed', '1 tsp cumin seeds, crushed', '2 small onions, each cut into 8 wedges', '1 lime, cut into wedges']
